#summary Details about the ArduRCT_Graphics library code

= Arduino library for graphic screens - Code details =
== Organisation ==
The library is organized into layers.<br><br>
<img src="http://ardurct.googlecode.com/svn/images/ArduRCT_Graphics.png" width="500"><br>
 * The Screen Implementation layer defines the implementation of the basic drawing functions at the hardware level, several implementation exist, you only have to use one:
   * ArduRCT_S6D04H0
   * ArduRCT_ST7735
 * The Screen Hardware Abstraction Layer manages the low level drawing functions such as: circles, lines, patterns, fonts, bitmaps. It is called ArduRCT_Graphics.<br>To make the code more readable:
  * the macros functions have been put in ArduRCT_GraphicsMacros.<br>
 * The Chip Management extends the Physical Layer. <br>For the moment, it can manage the following Chip On Glass devices:
  * S6D0H0
  * ILI932x
 * The Physical Layer manages the pins and buses.
<br>
